document.full_text: new hampshire governor john lynch on wednesday vetoed right-to-work legislation that would prohibit collective bargaining agreements requiring employees to join a labor union or pay dues.
document.title: new hampshire governor vetoes right-to-work bill
lines_and_colors: new hampshire governor john lynch on wednesday vetoed right-to-work legislation that would prohibit collective bargaining agreements requiring employees to join a labor union or pay dues.
